questionIds: d70fb21b-c337-425b-8b11-3ee2018f3fc4-จิตวิทยาองค์กร
skill: จิตวิทยาองค์กร

evaluations.subjectName: จิตวิทยาองค์การ
evaluations.reason: The course 'จิตวิทยาองค์การ' explicitly focuses on organizational psychology, covering theories, research, and applications related to psychological variables at individual, group, and organizational levels, making it highly relevant to the skill.

evaluations.subjectName: จิตวิทยาการเปลี่ยนแปลงและการพัฒนา
evaluations.reason: While the course discusses psychological concepts and theories related to organizational change and development, it is part of a broader topic and not solely focused on organizational psychology, making it fairly relevant.

evaluations.subjectName: จิตวิทยาการจูงใจในองค์การ
evaluations.reason: The course covers motivation theories and their application within organizations, which relates to organizational psychology but is not the primary focus, thus fairly relevant.

evaluations.subjectName: จิตวิทยาการทำงานเป็นทีม
evaluations.reason: Team psychology principles are discussed, which are related to organizational psychology, but the course emphasizes team dynamics more broadly, making it fairly relevant.

evaluations.subjectName: จิตวิทยาบุคลากร
evaluations.reason: Personnel psychology directly pertains to organizational psychology, covering concepts, theories, and practical applications, making it highly relevant.

evaluations.subjectName: จิตวิทยาการจัดการความขัดแย้งในองค์การ
evaluations.reason: Conflict management and negotiation in organizations are related to organizational psychology, but the focus is on specific skills rather than the broader field, making it fairly relevant.
Seminar courses involve research and discussion on industrial and organizational psychology topics but are not primarily focused on the skill itself, making it marginally relevant.

evaluations.subjectName: ระเบียบวิธีวิจัยทางจิตวิทยาอุตสาหกรรมและองค์การ
evaluations.reason: Research methodology in industrial and organizational psychology is related but more methodological than content-focused on the skill, making it fairly relevant.

evaluations.subjectName: จิตวิทยาการปรึกษาทางธุรกิจ
evaluations.reason: Business counseling psychology involves application of psychological principles in organizational contexts, related but not the core of organizational psychology, making it fairly relevant.

evaluations.subjectName: จิตวิทยาอุตสาหกรรมและองค์การข้ามวัฒนธรรม
evaluations.reason: Cross-cultural organizational psychology discusses behavior across cultures and management in diverse settings, related to organizational psychology but not the primary focus, making it fairly relevant.

evaluations.subjectName: จิตวิทยาสังคมประยุกต์ในการทำงาน
evaluations.reason: Social psychology applied to work involves understanding social behaviors in organizations, related but not the main focus, making it fairly relevant.
